projects.title: Gallery Management Tool
projects.summary: The Museum Management Tool streamlines the management of a museumâ€™s exhibition, as well as the artists in the collection and their work. Upload image files with confidence. This tool incorporates ActiveStorage to handle the associations between image files and models.

projects.title: Graphic Novel Review
projects.summary: This app is for all fans of graphic novels. Find and review your favorite graphic novels and managa. Register and sign in with confidence! Password security is ensured with BCrypt! Users can keep track of the books they've reviewed on a personalized profile page.

projects.title: TV Show Catalogue
projects.summary: A place to keep track of your To Be Watched pile. Shows are organized by genre. Add, delete and edit shows with ease.

projects.title: The Fanworks Archive
projects.summary: The Fanworks Archive is a place for fan fiction afficionados to share fan fiction! Please note, this is barebones, simple mockup of a fanworks archive.
